description.exp: Developed software for an IoT solution “Connected Retail 360” aimed at bringing online shopping experience to physical stores based on Azure IoT Best Practices. Responsible for architecting the project, DPS, developing the React-based Web Dashboard, building C/C++ based software for IoT devices, writing Azure Functions, tracking the project &c.

description.projname: Performance Engineering Project for Black Friday for an eCommerce business
description.exp: Worked on a Performance Engineering and Testing project for a major Canadian eCommerce Business. Responsible for developing jMeter scripts in Groovy, troubleshooting and monitoring project progress &c.

Worked as a Senior Developer as well as Front-End Developer for an NY-based startup, MC Master of Ceremony, aimed at developing a smartphone application/platform for artists to collaborate and compete. Worked in an Agile Environment with responsibilities involving code reviews, project managamenet on Jira, writing documentation on Confluence, research on the technology trends, unit testing on Jest &c. On the development side, my main contribution has been the development of a React-based Admin Dashboard hosted on AWS. Also got exposed to native app development on React Native as a code reviewer and tester.

Taught C/C++ to students of 12-17 age, programmed robots based on Arduino, Raspberry Pi platforms, developed games based on Python, OpenCV &c. Also taught 3D CAD on Autodesk Fusion 360 and 3D Printing.
